author: Get News
title: The 3RC20 Inscription Trading Platform drives 3TChat to lead the Web3.0 Revolution. | User | mammothtimes.com
text:
The 3T Ecosystem is set to launch the 3RC20 Inscription Trading Platform, propelling the crypto market's rapid growth once again through the SocialFi track
The 3RC20 Inscription Trading Platform provides users with an innovative and forward-looking blockchain experience. This upcoming platform will redefine the rules of digital trading, dedicated to offering a more secure, efficient, and convenient digital asset trading environment.
(3RC 20 Trading Scenarios)
1. Introduction of Inscription Technology:
The 3RC20 Inscription Trading Platform will introduce advanced inscription technology, adding an extra layer of security to transaction data. This technology uses innovative encryption methods to hide users' transaction information in irreversible encrypted inscriptions, significantly enhancing the privacy and security of digital asset transactions.
2. Decentralized Trading:
The 3RC20 Inscription Trading Platform is committed to promoting the development of decentralized trading. Supported by blockchain technology, it enables peer-to-peer transactions of digital assets without the need for third-party intermediaries, ensuring the transparency and traceability of transactions and giving users more confidence in participating in digital asset trading.
3. Integration of Smart Contracts:
Smart contracts are an important innovation in the blockchain world, and they are fully integrated into the 3RC20 Inscription Trading Platform. Users can implement automatically executed trading conditions through smart contracts, eliminating the trust barriers of traditional trading and providing a more efficient and reliable trading experience.
4. Multi-Chain Compatibility:
The 3RC20 Inscription Trading Platform will achieve multi-chain compatibility, allowing users to freely trade digital assets across different blockchain networks. This flexibility not only enhances user choice but also creates broader possibilities for the liquidity of digital assets.
5. Community Co-Governance:
We aim to promote community co-governance in the 3RC20 Inscription Trading Platform, giving users greater participation and say. Through mechanisms like token-based voting, community members will be able to participate in decision-making, ensuring the platform's development is closely linked to user needs.
The launch of the 3RC20 Inscription Trading Platform marks another important milestone in the development of the 3TChat ecosystem. We look forward to creating more possibilities for digital assets through this platform, making digital transactions smarter, more efficient, and secure. Stay tuned, as a revolution in digital asset trading is about to begin!
3TChat: The world's first decentralized privacy social platform built on quantum technology.
Standing at the forefront of Web3.0 application services, it's not only a gateway to the future but also a pioneer of the blockchain revolution. Our vision is to build a fair, just, co-creative, shared, and co-governed decentralized autonomous economy, empowering the evolution of the "information industry" and constructing the metaverse civilization of the WEB3 era. 3TChat truly achieves decentralized dual-encryption social applications, integrating privacy protection, instant messaging, video conferencing, asset management, cross-chain interoperability, and other features. It is the world's first Web3 social + blockchain technology comprehensive service ecosystem platform.
Now, let's delve into the functions and mission of 3TChat:
1. Internationalization of Private Social Networking
3TChat is based on decentralized DID digital identity technology. You don't need to provide personal identity information; just create a wallet to complete chain identity registration. Each communication is encrypted, ensuring your data sovereignty, privacy, and communication security. With zero storage of private information, you can chat freely and securely.
2. Security in Asset Management
We independently developed the 3Q quantum encryption wallet, featuring a built-in quantum chip and advanced security chip, merging hot and cold wallets, and keeping your funds and permissions safe from hackers and theft threats. 3TChat supports the management and storage of various cryptocurrencies, ensuring the security of your assets.
3. Globalization of Token Applications
3TChat uses native cross-chain technology to facilitate interoperability among multiple blockchain assets, addressing the complexity of the cross-chain ecosystem. You can use multi-chain digital assets, such as BTC, ETH, USDT, for payments and sending red packets, achieving diversified global payments in the Web3.0 era.
4. Convenience of One-Stop Services
The 3TChat platform offers one-stop comprehensive services. Based on the native public chain combined with cross-chain compatibility, blockchain business becomes simple on this platform. You can also create Dapps for third-party projects and establish your own large community. The 3TAI meeting system resolves the limitations of online meetings while providing efficient third-party services, meeting various needs of blockchain comprehensive services.
5. Diversification of Social Public Chains
On top of communication services, 3TChat integrates diversified public chains, including 3Q quantum wallet, cross-chain protocol, decentralized asset trading, NFT, DEFI, DAO, metaverse, etc., laying a solid infrastructure for the advance of Web3.0.
6. Shared Traffic
We provide public traffic and advertising services, allowing equal access for every third party to platform's public domain traffic. Ad links from project parties can be embedded in ad slots, enabling users to directly participate in project interactions. Joining the 3T platform is like gaining free access to over a hundred million traffic users, realizing the shared use of ecological traffic.
7. Ecosystem Autonomy
The 3TChat platform provides toolkits such as SDK, API interfaces, and infrastructure based on native public chain development, communication networks, hardware wallets, quantum mining machines, etc., supporting ecological construction. Future services will cover diverse ecosystems like live streaming, AI, shopping, local life, media, gaming, finance, etc. Through ecological development, we aim to enrich the circulation of 3T platform tokens and create value for global community users.
8. Democratic DAO Autonomy
3TChat is a platform pursuing decentralization in building Web3.0. Using SBT technology, it creates anonymous profiles and an immutable on-chain reputation system. Based on DAO protocol, it establishes a decentralized autonomous organization. Community members participate in governance and decision-making through DAO voting, ensuring democracy and transparency, aiding 3T's development in decentralized private social networking, and building a fair, just, co-creative, shared, and co-governed decentralized autonomous economy.
9. Publicization of Data On-Chain
3TChain public chain, whether it's building on DID digital identity, governing token issuance, or NFT minting, adheres to the principle of being fully on-chain and public. In the new era of Web3.0, 3TChat becomes a new opportunity and impetus for entrepreneurship and wealth creation. We are committed to aggregating traffic, transactions, tools, and projects to jointly shape the new face of Web3.0.
Amidst the rising trend of various BRC20 and other inscription trading platforms, the 3RC20 Inscription Trading Platform, crafted by the 3T community based on the 3T SocialFi ecosystem, will redefine the new paradigm of inscription trading. Integrating innovative inscription technology, decentralized social networking, smart contracts, on-chain trading, and multi-chain compatibility, it aims to provide global crypto users with a safer, more efficient, and convenient digital asset trading experience. Download 3TChat to access the 3RC20 Inscription Trading DAPP through wallet signature.
(Browse and scan the QR code or visit the official website: https://3tdao.io / to easily download)
